text: Kristin Cavallari Defends Husband Jay Cutler Against Fat Shamers by Sharing 'Hot AF' Photo -- See the Pic! by Alex Ungerman 2:20 PM   Playing Kristin Cavallari Defends Husband Jay Cutler Against Fat Shamers by Sharing 'Hot AF' Photo -- See the Pic! Kristin Cavallari knows how to shut down the body shamers . Earlier this week, the Hills alum shared a snap on Instagram from her 30th birthday vacation with husband Jay Cutler, writing, "I had the best birthday of my life and it was all thanks to this guy. Not only did he plan a huge surprise party, he planned a "surprise" trip to Mexico with some of my closest friends, too. Thanks, babe....you will probably never see this." A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 16, 2017 at 9:28am PST EXCLUSIVE: Kristin Cavallari Gushes Over Lauren Conrad's Pregnancy Announcement However, after some nasty comments about the NFL quarterback's weight, including one derogatorily referring to him as a "lesbian," the reality star shared another photo to call-out the haters, and set the record straight. "Since Jay looked like a 300lb lesbian in my last post, I felt I should do him justice by posting him looking hot AF in this one," Cavallari posted on Tuesday. A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 17, 2017 at 5:04pm PST WATCH: Kristin Cavallari Fires Back at Haters Commenting That Her Children Are Too Skinny Check out more photos from Cavallari's paradise getaway. A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 13, 2017 at 12:49pm PST A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 12, 2017 at 4:30pm PST A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 15, 2017 at 11:24am PST A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 18, 2017 at 8:56am PST Meanwhile, Cavallari is no stranger to dealing with social media haters. WATCH: Chrissy Teigen Defends Kristin Cavallari After Mom Shaming Controversy Over Fourth of July weekend in 2016, the TV personality responded to negative comments regarding her kids' weight, by sarcastically responding, "Yep, I starve my children. Just blocked the most people I‚Äôve ever blocked in my entire life. Happy 4th hahaha." A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jul 4, 2016 at 8:18am PDT "I love that people are sending me articles about the dangers of being a vegan," she tweeted the following week. "Maybe send it to someone that's actually vegan." I love that people are sending me articles about the dangers of being a vegan. Maybe send it to someone that's actually vegan. üêÑ
